## isGrpcProtocol() function

Check if context is gRPC protocol

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isGrpcProtocol(ctx: KoattyContext): ctx is KoattyContext & {
    protocol: 'grpc';
    rpc: NonNullable<KoattyContext['rpc']>;
};
```
